title: 12/21/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/21/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Something isn't right with the Chiefs

-The Jets need to consider keeping Sam Darnold now that they've lost Trevor Lawrence

-Baker Mayfield is better without OBJ and it's not arguable anymore

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Jimmy Johnson, 2x Super Bowl Champion & NFL on FOX


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
